label: uncl4403
comment: Code qualifying the type of instruction.

values.label: Action required
values.comment: Instruction requires action.

values.label: Party instructions
values.comment: The instructions are to be executed by means of a party.

values.label: Maximum value exceeded instructions
values.comment: Instruction how to act if maximum value will be or has been exceeded.

values.label: Confirmation instructions
values.comment: Documentary credit confirmation instructions.

values.label: Method of issuance
values.comment: Documentary credit confirmation of issuance.

values.label: Pre-advice instructions
values.comment: Documentary credit pre-advice instructions.

values.label: Documents delivery instruction
values.comment: Delivery instructions for documents required under a documentary credit.

values.label: Additional terms and/or conditions documentary credit
values.comment: Additional terms and/or conditions to the documentary credit.

values.label: Investment instruction
values.comment: Instruction refers to an investment.

values.label: Reimbursement instructions
values.comment: Instructions as to how the reimbursement is to be effected.

values.label: Instructions to the paying and/or accepting and/or negotiating bank
values.comment: Instructions to the paying and/or accepting and/or negotiating bank.

values.label: Instructions and/or information to the applicant
values.comment: Instructions and/or information to the applicant.

values.label: Case of need party power instructions
values.comment: Case of need party power instructions.

values.label: Instructions for payment in local currency
values.comment: Payment of the documentary credit in local currency instructions.

values.label: Instructions for return of acceptance draft
values.comment: Return of acceptance draft instructions.

values.label: Method for advice of non-payment
values.comment: Advice of non-payment method.

values.label: Documentary credit advice of non-acceptance method
values.comment: Advice of non-acceptance method of the documentary credit.

values.label: Documentary credit advice of payment method
values.comment: Advice of payment method of the documentary credit.

values.label: Documentary credit advice of acceptance method
values.comment: Advice of acceptance method of the documentary credit.

values.label: Instructions for the first transmission of documents
values.comment: Instructions for the first transmission of documents.

values.label: Instructions for the second transmission of documents
values.comment: Instructions for the second transmission of documents.

values.label: Instructions for terms of delivery of documents
values.comment: Instructions for terms of delivery of documents.

values.label: Instructions and/or information to the beneficiary
values.comment: Instructions and/or information to the beneficiary.

values.label: Protest instructions
values.comment: Instructions as to whether a protest is to be made.

values.label: Warehouse and/or insurance instructions
values.comment: Instructions about warehousing and/or insurance.

values.label: Charges waiver instructions
values.comment: Instructions as to whether charges may be waived.

values.label: Interest waiver instructions
values.comment: Instructions as to whether interest may be waived.

values.label: Deferral of payment and/or acceptance instructions
values.comment: Instructions as to whether payment and/or acceptance may be deferred.

values.label: Patient preparation
values.comment: Instruction concerning the preparation of a patient.

values.label: Dosage of medicine
values.comment: Instruction concerning the dosage of medicine.

values.label: Instruction about patient
values.comment: Instruction concerning a patient.

values.label: Meter reading instruction
values.comment: Instruction concerning the reading of a meter.

values.label: Meter change instruction
values.comment: Instruction concerning the change of a meter.

values.label: Return instruction
values.comment: An instruction concerning the return of items.
